summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CloudNest iteration 2 features. All P0 bug fixes and new features verified working correctly.
passed_tests: P0 BUG FIX VERIFIED: Order page Control Panel dropdown works correctly with value='none' - no crash
Control Panel dropdown allows selecting None, cPanel, WHM, Plesk options
Full order flow works: Plan selection -> Configuration -> Payment -> Place Order
Static page /about loads correctly
Static page /terms loads correctly
Static page /privacy loads correctly
Static page /sla loads correctly
Static page /aup loads correctly
Static page /data-centers loads correctly
Static page /support loads correctly with Skype option
Admin Settings page accessible at /admin/settings
Settings link visible in admin sidebar navigation
Admin Settings has all 5 tabs: Company, Contact & Support, Pages, Payment, Social
Skype ID field present in Contact & Support tab
Save All Settings button functional
Support page shows 'Skype support not configured' when skype_id is empty
Support page shows Skype button with ID when skype_id is configured
Support Tickets button present on Support page
Footer links to all new static pages working correctly
Backend API: /api/health endpoint working
Backend API: /api/settings/public endpoint working
Backend API: /api/plans endpoint working
Backend API: /api/auth/login working for user and admin
Backend API: /api/admin/settings GET working
Backend API: /api/admin/settings PUT working
Backend API: /api/orders POST with control_panel=None working
Backend API: /api/orders POST with control_panel=cpanel working
Backend API: /api/contact form submission working
seed_data_creation: Updated site settings with skype_id='cloudnest.support' for testing

mocked_integrations.SendGrid: Email integration is MOCKED if SENDGRID_API_KEY not configured

context_for_next_testing_agent: All features from iteration 2 are working correctly. The P0 bug fix for the Order page Control Panel dropdown has been verified - using value='none' instead of empty string prevents the crash. Admin Settings page is fully functional with all tabs. Support page correctly shows/hides Skype button based on skype_id configuration. All static pages (/about, /terms, /privacy, /sla, /aup, /data-centers, /support) are accessible and footer links work correctly.
